title: Drawing, "Galloping Horse Motif, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.
inscribed: On mat in graphite, upper left: Parzinger; upper center: 30 E. 23 8th Fl.; upper right: 110 E. 23 / WILLIAMS; center, above drawing: REDUCE to 4 1/2.
description: Galloping horse pattern in white on a black background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Galloping Horse Motif, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-60.
